common.selectMultipleKeys: Hold Ctrl / Cmd key to select multiple
common.name: Name
common.formValidationErrorMessage: Please correct the errors on the form shown in red and check the box acknowledging no refunds
common.passwordCreationInstruction: To create a new password, you have to meet all of the following requirements
common.passwordResetError: There was an error resetting your password

navigation.loginAsStaff: Login as Compact or State Staff

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introSubtext: This privacy policy describes how the CompactConnect website stores and uses visitor data.
privacyPolicy.collectedDataDevice: Type of device, browser, and IP address
privacyPolicy.whatIsDoneWithThisInfoTitle: What is done with this information?
privacyPolicy.whatIsDoneWithThisInfoSubtext: Information you provide helps us respond to your customer service requests and support needs more efficiently. We may use feedback you provide to improve our site. The information is not sold to third parties.
privacyPolicy.howIsMyDataProtectedSubtext: We adopt industry standard data collection, storage, and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information, username, password, transaction information, and data stored on our site.
privacyPolicy.changesToThisPolicySubtext: CompactConnect has the discretion to update this privacy policy at any time. We encourage you to frequently check this page for any changes to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this privacy policy periodically and become aware of modifications.
privacyPolicy.disclaimerSubtext: Other websites that are connected by hyperlinks to and / or from the CompactConnect website may not follow the same privacy constraints. We do not assume responsibility for the practices or content of any website which links to or from our site.

inputErrors.email: Must be a valid email address
inputErrors.uri: Must be a valid complete URL
inputErrors.maxLength: Must be less than or equal to {max} characters
inputErrors.minOfUppercase: Must have at least {min} uppercase characters
inputErrors.minOfLowercase: Must have at least {min} lowercase characters
inputErrors.minOfSpecialCharacters: Must have at least {min} special characters
inputErrors.doesNotInclude: Must not include your username or other common strings
inputErrors.maxItems: Must contain less than or equal to {max}
inputErrors.maxFiles: Must contain less than or equal to {max} files
inputErrors.fileGroupTooLargeBy: File group is too large by
inputErrors.oneOrMoreFilesTooLarge: One or more files are too large
inputErrors.lastNameRequired: Required when first name is provided
inputErrors.enterValidCreditCard: Must be a valid credit card number
inputErrors.currencyType: Must be a valid currency amount
inputErrors.minNumber: Must be greater than or equal to {min}
inputErrors.maxNumber: Must be less than or equal to {max}
inputErrors.invalidDateWithFormat: Date must be of required format {format}

serverErrors.loginError: There was an error logging you in.
serverErrors.dobFormat: Date of Birth must be in the format MM/DD/YYYY.
serverErrors.dobMaxDate: Date of Birth must be earlier than than or equal to today.
serverErrors.dobMinDate: Date of Birth must be later than or equal to 01/01/1900.
serverErrors.rateLimit: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts. Please try again later.
serverErrors.compactStatesLive: There was an error fetching the compact live states

phoneVerification.pleaseVerifyYourNumber: Please verify your phone number by following the prompts below.
phoneVerification.receiveCodeLabel: How would you like to receive a code?
phoneVerification.pleaseEnterTheCode: Please enter the code you received below
phoneVerification.verificationSuccess: This phone number has successfully been verified
phoneVerification.verifyPhoneSubheader: We will not be able to send any notifications to this phone number until it has been verified.

compact.configLoadingErrorCompact: There was an error loading the compact configuration
compact.configLoadingErrorState: There was an error loading the state configuration
compact.jurisprudenceInfoLinkSubtext: Compact privilege seekers will be able to follow this link for additional information about your state's jurisprudence requirements
compact.opsNotificationEmailsSubtext: Enter all recipients who should be notified of support requests (e.g. invalid data that a jurisdiction has uploaded, or any other issues that may arise).
compact.adverseActionsNotificationEmailsSubtext: Enter all recipients who should be notified of encumbrances (e.g. licensees that have had their licenses revoked or suspended).
compact.summaryReportEmailsSubtext: Enter all recipients who will receive periodic summary reports.
compact.licenseRegistrationEnabledSubtext: This enables live status for purchasing privileges, and this action is irreversible.
compact.privilegePurchaseEnabled: State is live for compact privilege purchase
compact.privilegePurchaseEnabledSubtext: This enables live status for purchasing privileges, and this action is irreversible.
compact.confirmSaveCompactTitle: Are you sure you want to mark this state as live?

stateUpload.formSubtext: Current uploads are for test purposes and the data will not be saved permanently
stateUpload.successTitle: Your document has been uploaded successfully
stateUpload.successSubTitle: If your document encounters any errors during processing you will be notified via email

payment.confirmCardDetailsError: There was an error confirming your payment details. Please try again.
payment.purchaseSuccessfulMessage: Your purchase was successful. Your privileges will appear on your profile page within seconds. If you submitted incorrect documents, you will be contacted by compact staff.

licensing.searchSubtext: Enter at least one field to search for licensing data.
licensing.searchStateDisabled: Please first select a profession type
licensing.noRefundsMessage: All compact privilege purchases are final. Refunds will not be issued.
licensing.incorrectInfoDisclaimer: The information on this page was provided by your home state. If the information is incorrect, you must reach out to that state and ask them to correct it. Refer to the compact FAQ page for more information.
licensing.privilegePurchaseLimit: A maximum of 20 privileges may be selected in one transaction
licensing.twoHomeStateErrorMessage: Two states have you listed as a resident. Please update your information with those states to reflect your current residency status.
licensing.jurisprudenceExplanationText: I attest I have successfully completed a jurisprudence exam for this state, if required
licensing.scopeAttestLabel: Click here to read and affirm the scope of practice attestation.
licensing.confirmPrivilegeDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this privilege? This cannot be undone.
licensing.confirmPrivilegeDeactivateTitle: Are you sure you want to deactivate this privilege?
licensing.confirmPrivilegeDeactivateSubtext: The practitioner will no longer be able to use this privilege. This does not constitute a disciplinary action.
licensing.confirmLicenseEncumberTitle: Are you sure you want to encumber this license?
licensing.confirmLicenseEncumberSubtext: The practitioner will no longer be able to use this license.
licensing.confirmPrivilegeEncumberTitle: Are you sure you want to encumber this privilege?
licensing.confirmPrivilegeEncumberSubtext: The practitioner will no longer be able to use this privilege.
licensing.confirmLicenseUnencumberSuccess: These encumbrances are set to be removed.
licensing.confirmPrivilegeUnencumberSuccess: These encumbrances are set to be removed.
licensing.confirmLicenseInvestigationStartSubtext: Clicking “Yes” will notify compact member states of a significant investigation ongoing for this practitioner license. Are you sure you want to proceed?
licensing.confirmLicenseInvestigationStartSuccess: Member states will be notified of a significant ongoing investigation
licensing.confirmPrivilegeInvestigationStartSubtex: Clicking “Yes” will notify compact member states of a significant investigation ongoing for this practitioner privilege. Are you sure you want to proceed?
licensing.confirmPrivilegeInvestigationStartSucces: Member states will be notified of a significant ongoing investigation
licensing.confirmLicenseInvestigationEndSubtext1: You are ending an investigation that started on {date}.
licensing.confirmLicenseInvestigationEndSubtext2: Do you need to report an encumbrance? If so, click “Add encumbrance” below. If not, click “No encumbrance” below, and other states will be notified that the investigation was ended with no encumbrance.
licensing.confirmLicenseInvestigationEndSuccess: This investigation has ended and no encumbrance was added.
licensing.confirmPrivilegeInvestigationEndSubtext1: You are ending an investigation that started on {date}.
licensing.confirmPrivilegeInvestigationEndSubtext2: Do you need to report an encumbrance? If so, click “Add encumbrance” below. If not, click “No encumbrance” below, and other states will be notified that the investigation was ended with no encumbrance.
licensing.confirmPrivilegeInvestigationEndSuccess: This investigation has ended and no encumbrance was added.
licensing.underInvestigationAlertLocation: This practitioner is under investigation in {locations}.
licensing.underInvestigationAlertStatus: Privileges can still be used while under investigation.
licensing.expirationTimeExplanation: Privilege dates use the UTC-4 time zone. This means that privileges will expire at 11:59PM US Eastern Time during Daylight Savings (summer), and at 10:59 PM in the US Eastern time zone during Standard Time (winter).

npdbTypes.name: Improper Supervision or Allowing Unlicensed Practice
npdbTypes.key: Improper Supervision or Allowing Unlicensed Practice

licensing.privilegeProofFooter:
This document is issued by Compact Connect as official proof of the practitioner’s current privileges to practice.
It confirms privilege-to-practice status only and is not intended to be a verification of state licensure.
licensing.qrCodeAlt: QR code linking to public profile
licensing.licenseDeactivationNote: Deactivated due to associated license being deactivated
licensing.homeStateChangeNote: Deactivated due to home state change
licensing.whyUnavailableInfoButton: Show explanation for why privilege purchase is unavailable
licensing.purchaseUnavailableMessage: You are currently not eligible to purchase compact privileges. Please see the reason(s) below.
licensing.purchaseUnavailableNoEligibleLicenses: You do not have any licenses which are eligible for compact participation. If you believe one of your licenses should be eligible, please contact the state board who issued that license.
licensing.purchaseUnavailableEncumbrance: You have an encumbrance which prevents you from buying privileges. If you believe you should not have an encumbrance, please contact the state board who recorded the encumbrance.
licensing.purchaseUnavailablePendingMilitaryStatus: You started the process of providing documentation to confirm your military status but did not finish. You can complete that process
licensing.purchaseUnavailableEncumbranceLiftedWith: It has been fewer than two years since your most recent encumbrance was lifted. You will be able to purchase privileges after two years have passed from the end of your most recent encumbrance.

military.endAffiliationModalTitle: Are you sure you want to end your military affiliation?
military.endAffiliationModalContent: This action cannot be undone, but if needed, you can go through the confirmation process again.

affiliationAttestationOptions.name: I hereby attest and affirm that I am an active-duty military member, defined as a person with a full-time duty status in the active uniformed service of the United States, including members of the National Guard and Reserve on active duty orders.

I hereby attest and affirm that I am the legal spouse of an active-duty military member, defined as a person with a full-time duty status in the active uniformed service of the United States, including members of the National Guard and Reserve on active duty orders.

military.successLongProcess: Submit successful, your status may take a minute to process
military.fileInstructions: Only 1 file (PDF, docx, png, jpeg only)
military.initializingMessage: Your document is in an initializing state. This may indicate that there was an error uploading. You cannot purchase privileges in this state. If this status persists, try uploading your document again or clicking end military affiliation and then refreshing the page.
military.militaryStatusInitializingErrorTitle: There’s an error with your military status.
military.militaryStatusInitializingErrorSubtext: To purchase privileges, you will need to either re-upload your document(s) or end your military affiliation.

account.requestAccountSubtext: The information you provide here must match exactly the information your home state has on file. If your information does not match, you will be unable to create an account.
account.requestAccountHomeStateInfo: Not all states are live and ready for licensee account creation or issuing privileges. Please check with the compact commission for details about your state.
account.requestAccountEmailSubtext: This email address is where we will send information regarding your account. It does not need to match the information provided by your state.
account.requestSuccessSubtext: If your information is valid you will be receiving an email to finish setting up your account.
account.requestErrorTitle: There was an error processing your request
account.requestErrorCompactMissing: The compact could not be determined from the license type
account.requestErrorRecaptcha: There was an error fetching the recaptcha token. If the error persists please contact support.
account.usersListEmpty: Invite users with the button above
account.confirmUserReinviteTitle: Are you sure you want to resend the invitation to {name}?
account.confirmUserReinviteSubtext: An email will be sent to {email} and the user will be forced to set a new password.
account.confirmUserDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate {name} from this compact? This cannot be undone.
account.accountSummarySubtext: Here is the information you submitted for your registration. If your information does not match exactly with the information in our system, the registration will not be successful.
account.enterVerificationCodeSubtext: You should be receiving an email at the new address with a confirmation code. The code will expire in about 15 minutes.
account.emailUpdateSuccess: Your email has been updated successfully
account.resetAccountSubtext1: If you’re locked out of your existing licensee account and need to reset your MFA (Multi-Factor Authentication), please reset your account below. If you are a staff member who is locked out of your account, please contact your compact administrator.
account.resetAccountSubtext2: The information you provide here must match exactly the information your home state has on file. If your information does not match, you will be unable to reset your account.
account.resetAccountEmailSubtext: This email address is where we will send information regarding your account. It must match the exact email used in your existing account.
account.resetAccountPasswordSubtext: This password must match the exact password used in your existing account.
account.resetAccountSummarySubtext: Here is the information you submitted for your account reset. If your information does not match exactly with the information in our system, the account reset will not be successful.
account.resetAccountSuccessSubtext1: You will receive a new CompactConnect invitation email with a new temporary password.
account.resetAccountSuccessSubtext2: Please be sure to follow the invitation instructions within the timeframe specified in the email to avoid being locked out of your account.
account.resetAccountErrorSubtext: If you are trying to reuse a link that was sent to you, be aware that the links are only valid for a short period of time and can only be used once.

recaptcha.googleDesc: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google

styleGuide.defaultModalContent: This is an example of a Modal
styleGuide.errorModalContent: This is an example of a error-styled Modal
styleGuide.customModalContent: You can add custom actions (buttons) when you include the v-slot:actions in your Modal

homeJurisdictionChange.formSubtext: If you have changed your state of residence or otherwise need to update your home state, please do so here. Your old and new home states, if they are compact members, will be notified of the change.
homeJurisdictionChange.inputSubtext: This selection means your current compact privileges will be deactivated and you will no longer be able to practice under them.
homeJurisdictionChange.modalTitle: Are you sure you want to change {newState} to your new home state?
homeJurisdictionChange.modalSubtext: Changing your home state may affect your privileges. If you already have a compact-eligible license in your new home state, your privileges will transfer. If you do not have a license in your new home state, or your license is not eligible, your privileges will be deactivated.
homeJurisdictionChange.successTitle: You have successfully changed your home state.
homeJurisdictionChange.successSubtext: Your former home state and new home state will be automatically notified of this change.
